rows.label: qev050106_MSG0001
rows.name:
Despite his quiet exterior, a bright fire rages inside the
breast of Gi Ziorde.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0002
rows.name:
It is thanks to you that I was able to see my partner for
the warrior he truly is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0003
rows.name: ...What? Our master bade you fight the both of us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0004
rows.name:
I will not repeat the shameful display I put on before.
Are you prepared to fight at this moment,
or do we need grant you temporary quarter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you are ready when they are.

rows.label: qev050106_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you still need to prepare.

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0005
rows.name:
Our combined strength is enough to grind the
mountains themselves into dust.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0006
rows.name: Come prepared, or the price may be your life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0008
rows.name:
My soul thirsts always for battle, especially one fought
by your side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0009
rows.name:
Use your power however you see fit.
I will guard your back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0010
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! Then I have nothing to fear!
Now, let us begin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0011
rows.name:
I came to the Outfitters test hangar after being told that
a true battle awaited me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0012
rows.name: But you already have another challenger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050106_MSG0013
rows.name:
How about defeating them as a little warm-up, eh?
Ha ha ha![ST:wait ]
